Hero.dynamicBioPhrase3: Bringing ideas to life with code.

ProfileSection.status: Full-Stack Developer | Mobile Developer | UI/UX Designer

Career.pageSubtitle: A timeline of my academic and professional growth.
Career.fullStackDescription: Developed and maintained web applications using Next.js, NestJS, and PostgreSQL. Implemented robust APIs and ensured seamless integration between frontend and backend systems. Focused on creating scalable and efficient solutions.
Career.codeIgniterDescription: Designed and developed web applications using CodeIgniter framework. Responsible for database management, API development, and ensuring application performance and security. Collaborated with teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Career.internshipDescription: Assisted in the development of internal tools and learned best practices in software development.

ServicesSection.subtitle: I offer a range of services to help bring your digital ideas to life.
ServicesSection.webDevelopmentDescription: Building responsive, high-performance web applications using modern frameworks and technologies.
ServicesSection.mobileDevelopmentDescription: Creating intuitive and engaging mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
ServicesSection.backendApiDevelopmentDescription: Designing and implementing robust, scalable, and secure backend systems and APIs.
ServicesSection.technicalConsultingDescription: Providing expert advice and solutions for your technical challenges and project planning.

SkillsPage.description: Here are some of the technologies and tools I've worked with, categorized by area of expertise.

IndexPage.schoolManagementSystemDescription: A comprehensive web application for managing school operations, including student records, courses, and grades. Features user authentication, role-based access control, and reporting functionalities.
IndexPage.wineManagementApplicationDescription: An application designed for vineyards to manage their wine production, inventory, and sales. Includes features for tracking grape harvests, fermentation processes, and bottle aging.
IndexPage.personalPortfolioWebsiteDescription: My personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and professional journey. Built with modern web technologies to provide a smooth and interactive user experience.
IndexPage.carSalesManagementPlatformDescription: A platform for managing car sales, inventory, and customer information. Features include vehicle listing, sales tracking, and report generation.
IndexPage.realTimeWeatherApplicationDescription: A mobile application that provides real-time weather updates based on the user's location or selected city. Displays current temperature, forecasts, and other meteorological data.
IndexPage.scientificSocialNetworkDescription: A social networking platform tailored for the scientific community, allowing researchers to connect, share papers, and collaborate on projects. Features include user profiles, publication sharing, and discussion forums.
IndexPage.aiTrainingGenerationDescription: An application leveraging AI to generate personalized training programs. Users can input their goals and preferences to receive customized workout plans.
IndexPage.carMusicPartyDescription: A unique application designed to synchronize music playback across multiple devices in a car, creating a shared music experience for all passengers.
IndexPage.dentalPracticeManagementSystemDescriptio: A comprehensive system for managing dental practice operations, including patient appointments, medical records, billing, and inventory. Designed for efficiency and ease of use.
IndexPage.akoraMGDescription: Discover authentic Malagasy crafts and support local artisans through our AI-powered marketplace.
